title: ATP World Tour 250, Marrakech Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: April 15, 2018 / 2:45 PM / Updated 2 hours ago ATP World Tour 250, Marrakech Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 4 Min Read Apr 15 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour 250, Marrakech Men's Singles matches on Sunday ..
